import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useFetch } from '../../Utils/useFetch' import './CartPage.css' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' export const CartPage = () =>{ const [productsIDs, setProductsIDs] = useState([]) useEffect( () =>{ const pegarLocalStorage = () => JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('produtos')) ?? [] const dbCLient = pegarLocalStorage() setProductsIDs() }, []) const { products } = useFetch() return(

Meu Carrinho

{products.map( (product) => (

{product.title}

{/* Quantidade: */}

R$:{product.price},00

))}
) } /*

Meu Carrinho

IMG

Title

Price

*/
